question: In organisms, macromolecules are made up of subunits. Which of these pairs correctly describes how a macromolecule is constructed?
candidate_answers: (A) DNA is made up of nucleic acids. (B) Protein is made up of amino acids. (C) Nucleic acids are made up of DNA. (D) Amino acids are made up of protein.
answer: Protein is made up of amino acids.
label: B
